name: tennis_game
description: "2D Tennis, a tennis game" is a simple top-down tennis video game that follows the same scoring as tennis. [Refer to the USTA for more information on scoring rules.](https://www.usta.com/en/home/improve/tips-and-instruction/national/tennis-scoring-rules.html) In "2D Tennis", players only need to win 1 set of singles to win the match.
